job_history.work_description: Partnered with legal department of multi-state client to establish ADAAA and other workplace compliance. Identified and updated a backlog of LOA and accommodation issues.

Human resources advisor to a diverse group of clients from various industries, delivering customized HR service solutions that positively impact client business and ensure compliance with State and Federal laws.
Partnered with managers to interpret and implement company policy, providing insight and guidance on employment law in order to maintain consistency and compliance.
Partnered with managers and supervisors in order to provide HR support for 3 sites in Southern California, with over 600 employees.
Provided general support for the HR department and director of HR.

skills.name: HR Consulting
skills.explanation: Partnered with clients to establish workplace compliance and resolve accommodation issues, demonstrating strong proficiency in HR consulting.

skills.name: Employment Law
skills.explanation: Provided guidance on employment law to managers and ensured compliance with State and Federal laws, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Compliance Management
skills.explanation: Ensured compliance with workplace regulations and laws, demonstrating strong proficiency in compliance management.

skills.name: HR Support
skills.explanation: Provided HR support for multiple sites and employees, indicating strong proficiency in HR support.

skills.name: Policy Implementation
skills.explanation: Partnered with managers to implement company policy, showing a solid working proficiency in policy implementation.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided general support for the HR department and director of HR, but no extensive leadership experience is mentioned.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Delivered customized HR service solutions and provided guidance on employment law, indicating a solid working proficiency in communication.
